name: Virus Crashers
description: The retro magic of the NES-era has returned! 99 tough stages will recall the feeling of childhood days.Be careful when playing Virus Crashers, and don't get too addicted!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: Celeron 1.2Ghz Memory: 1000 MB RAM Graphics: Onboard DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 10 MB available space Sound Card: Onboard Additional Notes: Broadband internet connection is required for online multi play
